name: Sales Placements Australia
tag_list: sales, executive-recruitment, search, headhunter, it, technology, recruitment, talent-acquistion, consulting-services, management, executive
overview:
Sales Placements Australia operates a highly professional sales, marketing and executive search solution that solves several key issues in recruitment for this unique market. We have developed our model in partnership with talented candidates and some of the most desirable employers in the Asia-Pacific region.

The hiring of talented sales, marketing and senior executives is crucial to the ongoing success and growth of a business. We continually match the right talent to the right company, and our success rate on all retained work is 100%.

WHY CHOOSE US?

By choosing Sales Placements, you will trust a small, but incredibly dedicated and highly trained team of individuals that will be focusing on positive results. The team has significant recruitment experience in tough markets; including International exposure in the USA and UK combined with domestic expertise in Australia and the Asia-Pacific region. This also brings to bear the benefit of our network of contacts, spanning almost every time zone in the world.

Choosing a recruitment company is an involved and considered choice for the best candidates and clients. Nominating someone to represent you or your business in the hiring process requires that you appoint a company that recognises your professional reputation is at stake.

OUR CANDIDATE VALUES

Our stakeholders have much in common with candidates, we were candidates once too! Similarly our stakeholders have held roles in mid and high management remits. Common feedback we receive time and again is that we have taken the extra step to understand our candidate’s needs and provide them frank and robust advice that has real practical value.

Feel free to contact me and allow me to help you to decide how best to engage our services, ensuring that the outcome fits the strategic hiring objectives of you or your business.
